course_description: Introduction to combinational and sequential logic circuits, and microprocessor hardware. Topics include transistors, gates, flipflops, counters, clocks, decoders, displays, microprocessors, memory, input/output circuits, and device interfacing.
prerequisites: This course requires PHYS 142/PHYS_OX 142 OR PHYS 152/PHYS_OX152 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites
